abstracts.cdata!:
The purpose of the project is to help
            Punjap implement a five-year time slice of on-going
            irrigation development programs implemented by existing
            institutions. The project would: increase quantity,
            reliability and equitable distribution of irrigation water
            through modernization of major and minor irrigation systems
            and undertake studies and introduce pilot demonstration
            schemes for on-farm works. In addition, it would provide
            funds to GOI for the preparation of irrigation projects
            throughout India. The project is designed to increase food
            production and the standard of living of the farmers in Punjab.
